== JonMasters ==

Random Linux user and GNU Stallmanite. Recently concentrating on embedded Linux (PowerPC 405GPs, Xilinx Virtex II Pro FPGAs, etc.) as well as Systems Administration and random coding. Likes to wibble loudly - loved or hated as a mutually exclusive and very binary operation. Often to be found in Reading, London, Witney, Oxford, Nottingham, irc.oftc.net, and at http://www.jonmasters.org/ Conforms to "JCM Time" which has been defined by PaulSladen (http://www.paul.sladen.org/) as GMT+42. Writes articles for random GNU/Linux magazines.
